alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 1:16AM MDT until May 13 at 3:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain affecting El Paso County. For the Fountain Creek...including Fountain Creek near Fountain... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain Creek near Fountain. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM MDT Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 12.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 04/30/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 130 PM MDT.
